learn

Interface IRelationClassifierFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BayesRelationFactory, VotingRelationFactory

    public interface IRelationClassifierFactory
    A factory for creating new relation classifier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRelationClassifier loadModel(java.lang.String path)
      Load a classifier which is saved to a file
      IRelationClassifier trainModel(java.lang.Iterable<ITrainingData> data)
      Train a new model on the stream of training data

    • Method Detail

      • trainModel

        IRelationClassifier trainModel(java.lang.Iterable<ITrainingData> data)
        Train a new model on the stream of training data
        Parameters:
        data - labelled data for training a model
        Returns:
        a trained classifier

      • loadModel

        IRelationClassifier loadModel(java.lang.String path)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Load a classifier which is saved to a file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file containing the classifier
        Returns:
        a loaded classifier
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be accessed
